participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i only listen to country music.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and thoughtful, Emily has a passion for helping others and enjoys spending time with her family.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
